website_summaries.verdict: If you have a lot of paper to punch, this model will get the job done at a good price.
pros: This punch can do 12 pieces of paper at a time, but this machine comes in several sizes to handle up to 40 pieces of paper
Little effort is needed to get it to work
Lip helps you line up your paper for even holes
cons: The dies on this model aren't adjustable
However, they're set at a standard 3-ring binder spacing

customer_reviews.title: inexpensive and easy to use, but somewhat poor hole placement
customer_reviews.text: I am reviewing the PaperPro inPRESS 12 Reduced Effort Three-Hole Punch in Silver/Black. At $7 it was an absolute bargain. I love PaperPro's staplers, with which you can staple a lot of pages with the light touch of one finger, and this punch is also very light and easy to use. My only complaint is that it punches the holes a bit too close to the edge of the paper: a little less than 1/4" from the edge, whereas most punches are closer to 3/8". For someone who is less of an office supply nerd than I am, it would be a perfect product.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Wilson

customer_reviews.title: I love this hole puncher
customer_reviews.text: I love this hole puncher. I bought it to use for work since I deal with alot of paperwork that I have to print out and insert into an Avery binder. Smooth punching and no guessing if the your lining the paper right due to the paper guide built in. I love the locking feature that helps to limit the amount of space that it would take up placed in a desk drawer. To empty it is pretty easy as well. just flip the opening up like you would on a tic-tac container and empty it out.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!--Does the job with ease
customer_reviews.text: I had a 250-page document to three-hole punch, and this PaperPro inPress 12 did the job in about 4 minutes. The holes aligned about 1/2" into the inner edge of each page. I did about 10 pages per 'punch'. The holes are cleanly punched/cut and fit a standard 3-ring binder perfectly. And, the device requires very little effort to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Practical Desk

customer_reviews.title: Does it’s job well
customer_reviews.text: I am a grad student and I put this hole puncher through the ringer (pun intended). I use it weekly to hole punch hundreds of papers (12 at a time). I do wish I had more funds to purchase a hole puncher that can punch through more than 12 sheets, but this does the job so well, that I am satisfied. It shows no signs of wear after months of use. I would recommend this to fellow students, teachers, and friends.
customer_reviews.author: AunnaG

customer_reviews.title: Positively Perfect PaperPro ProPunch!
customer_reviews.text: PaperPro products are a lifesaver! As a teacher, I am always looking for school supplies that make my life easier. Most hole punches I have to use a lot of arm muscle/force and can only punch holes in a few pieces at a time. This allows me to hole punch more paper at once and does not require as much effort. Occasionally, punch outs fall out of the bottom when it is overflowed. But, when emptied regularly, this is not an issue. The lock feature is extremely helpful for transporting back and forth in my teacher bag as needed. Next to an electric hole puncher, this is the best hole puncher I have ever used!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Blanchard

customer_reviews.title: I really loved this 3-hole punch
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this 3-hole punch. It worked so much more smoothly that my last one. Most of it is metal, but the paper guide is plastic, which broke, and now it is very difficult to line up. I wish they would have used a better material for the guide. It is now basically useless, and I have only had it since mid-January.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a nice holepunch:  Note paper guide is at the top of the whole punch.
customer_reviews.text: I do wish I had taken the time to look at the picture a little closer. I purchased this hole punch over cheaper ones because of the paper guide. However the guide keeps the top of your papers aligned, and I was after one that aligns the bottom of the papers. I don't mind papers sticking out the top of my binders, but I like a nice neat stack at the bottom of the folder (helps the folder stand nicely). So I am now getting used to turning my papers upside down so I can have a nice and neat paper pile at the bottom of the folder.
customer_reviews.author: MsVegemite

customer_reviews.title: Good value, appears very durable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and good value. This is not a heavy duty item like you would find in an office setting, however, this item does have some weight to it, is easy to use, and so far it is working great for me. I punch about 6-7 sheets of paper at a time. This virus is going around I am getting paperwork from school at home for my little one so I am punching holes in the paperwork and placing inside a binder for easy use. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: B.J. Jefferson

customer_reviews.title: Simply amazing
customer_reviews.text: How can one be amazed by a three hole punch? I’m not sure how, but I sure am. Even though This item does not cost a lot of money, I wanted to make sure that I was buying something high-quality that last me for decades because most of my office supplies are that way. This three hole punch has the potential to last me my entire lifetime. It is very sturdy, works very well, and it is easy to dispose of the waste. I would not hesitate to buy this again, unless it malfunctions in the near future. The lock feature is an added bonus, it allows you to lock the handle down for a slimmer profile.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: and still works just as great as the day we bought it
customer_reviews.text: Had to chuck after first use when I accidentally punched a staple and it dulled in enough that it was no longer usable. Very disappointing. I have a large one in a combined area that our office has had for years, that has punched through years of staples, and still works just as great as the day we bought it. I literally threw this on away after its first day of use, and maybe fifth or sixth punch.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wilde

customer_reviews.title: Charged for an excellent, sold a mediocre
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a PaperPro and, without explanation, was sent a less expensive Bostitch. I ordered a PaperPro due to its great reputation and after using one at work after my old Bostitch repeatedly jammed.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great, sleek hole puncher
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for the office! There's a plastic aligner at the top of the hole puncher to keep all your papers in line, which I find really helpful. It also has a lock feature on the side: if you don't want a toddler to get into the puncher or you just don't want it out, the hole puncher will lock and you cannot punch papers.
customer_reviews.author: Danna

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality with a low price.
customer_reviews.text: Although I've only had this Bostitch Three-Hole Punch for a few weeks, I have put it to major use and completely satisfied so far. It seems to be well put together. I have had no problems punching 5-8 sheets at a time which is my personal limit. I've punched about 300 sheets so far with no issues. The lock works great too. This purchase is well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chevz

customer_reviews.title: Good but still not real easy to punch holes
customer_reviews.text: This hole punch is good, though I was hoping it would be a little easier to push than the typical standard kind.. I still have to press hard to punch through more than a 2-3 sheets of paper, which is not ideal for hands with arthritis.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Only for light use.
customer_reviews.text: When I punched 300 sheets in groups of ten, stacks of little punched circles filled up the base and wouldn't come out of the exit hatch. When these jammed up and interfered with the top punch, I had to take the base to get rid of the paper. Tweezers and a straightened paper clip were required. When I struggled to get the base back on, a piece chipped off, so now I'm wary of removing the base again. I think this punch would be fine for occasional use, but it's not for big jobs.
customer_reviews.author: L. King

customer_reviews.title: Takes some getting used to, but a good product
customer_reviews.text: It's odd that the paper lines up at the top instead of the bottom, but the hole punch works well. I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Danton M.

customer_reviews.title: 12 page capacity misstated
customer_reviews.text: The item I received looks like the same product but is labeled as BOSTITCH on the device. The 12 page rating is misstated for stock inkjet paper. 12 pages will not fit. 9-10 max.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Well made and designed. Heavy duty feeling with the added features of a lock and paper guide. Very easy to use and empty. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Roland W Edwards

customer_reviews.title: the middle punch doesn't go all the way through after 11 uses
customer_reviews.text: Got this Sep 3, 2018. I used it 11 times and it no longer punches all the way through the middle hole. If you're going to be doing a lot of hole punching, get a better one. This one is ok if you're only using it very lightly because, as it says, it only punches one-to-two sheets at a time anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Mara Emily Lindstrom

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 3 months-flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this hole punch 3 months ago and rarely used it. The top hole punch won't go all the way down after 3 months of use. It is easy to use and has a small profile and cheap. You get what you pay for. In the landfill it goes. I will give it another go and if it breaks again, I will give it 1 star. See other reviews with this exact problem.
customer_reviews.author: doctorjohnny

customer_reviews.title: Good punch with small profile.
customer_reviews.text: The punch does it's job. It's not as easy as using a punch with better leverage and more than a few layers becomes difficult quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Indiana Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say about this three hole puncher except that it works great each time I use it. There is little effort to use use. Max I punched was 10 pages and all I needed was a little push with my palm. The puncher is easy to empty with the large push button to release the tray on the back of the punch.
customer_reviews.author: B. Le

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: This 3 hole punch is pretty good for the price. I just received it and have only used it once but so far it appears to be a good product. I wish the stop guide was on the other side however as I have to put the top of the paper at the stop guide which causes the paper to move but if you're careful it works. Just would be easier and better if the stop guide was at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Falcsik

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Have only had it for a few hours now but my son (8) and I both love it. Have used it for regular paper and construction paper, and it cuts with ease! Looking forward to using this for a long time to come. Definitely feels study enough that it should last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Had to have one for home
customer_reviews.text: I use this exact hole punch at work so I had to have one for home! Very easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia K Shumaker

customer_reviews.title: Durable, still working after months of use
customer_reviews.text: After months of use, this whole puncher is still working. I have not had any issues with this product, and its quality is extremely good. I can definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Sweet

customer_reviews.title: It does not hold back!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. I have punched holes in up to 12 pieces without any issues. Sometimes my hands cramp and this hole punch does not give me any issues with hand cramping. I have even punched up to 14 pieces. Only did it once and it handled it like a pro. Highly recommend. And for the price! Definitely a deal! It showed up quickly as well!
customer_reviews.author: Ispyhisgrlmyguy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for ten pages at a time
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this for about three weeks now and love it! Can’t beat it for the price. I use it on about ten papers at a time. If that’s what you need then this would be perfect. Feels lightweight but sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: AshW

customer_reviews.title: Seems kind of flimsy
customer_reviews.text: This is a fixed 3 hole punch, spacing cannot be adjusted in any way. I was trying to hole punch laminated sheets 2-3 at a time and it was jamming and getting stuck, and I need a lot of force to punch 1 laminated sheet. Sure lamination is thicker and harder on hole punches, but this thing is rated for 12 paper sheets. I wish I paid the extra for a more robust hole punch.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Paper Punch
customer_reviews.text: I love this piece of office equipment. It is sturdy and good quality. Easy to use and the directions are clear and easy to understand. I felt it was a good or better than the paper punch I have used in the past in my work office area. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good office product
customer_reviews.text: It is something that you need in your office for sure. The price is reasonable and it is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected, however, it doesnt catch huge portion of paper. So if you are expecting to work with a lot of paper, better buy other product, otherwise, works very well
customer_reviews.author: Key

customer_reviews.title: happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. It is light-weight and easy to use compared to my old 3-hole punch, which required more force to engage. Will be using with grandkids--so perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Great for my home office
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for my needs and at a great price. I was using a small plastic hole punch and getting very frustrated by the way it works and getting those paper holes all over the place. I like the way it will lock closed so I can slip it in a small drawer at my desk. I'm happy with this PaperPro punch.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Desert Rat

customer_reviews.title: A must have for any high School or College students desk
customer_reviews.text: Great hole puncher for price. Excellent quality! Will last a long time. The alignment feature and lock to place in drawers is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect size
customer_reviews.text: great for home or office. holds up well and fits quite a few pages of paper
customer_reviews.author: fairy princess

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Design
customer_reviews.text: I ordered several different brands of hand held 3 hole punches and this punch won. This is a very well designed product. Light weight, compact size, sharp punches, and has a very smooth punch stroke. Easy to operate holding with one hand. It has a lock feature that keeps the handle down in a closed position for storage. There's a friction fit access door at the rear bottom of the punch for emptying. Punches are not adjustable. I wonder if an Industrial Designer was involved in the design process.
customer_reviews.author: RPSGA

customer_reviews.title: A nice whole puncher
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product to have on hand, the only thing is that sometimes it gets stuck when I punch 7 pieces of paper, but other than that not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia C.

customer_reviews.title: Compact and useful
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and small enough to store on a shelf. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: maxx12

customer_reviews.title: Best 3-hole Punch Ever!
customer_reviews.text: The absolute best 3-hole punch I've ever owned! Hands down, the advertisement of this item does exactly what it says it will do. I can easily hole-punch 40 sheets without a struggle. You never have to adjust the line up of sheets of paper, as there is a stopper at the end to give your papers the same location of holes each and every time. If you are in the market to buy one, this is the one. You won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: MIOKYUN

customer_reviews.title: good !
customer_reviews.text: Its is a good one and price is cheaper than retail store.
customer_reviews.author: SARAH

customer_reviews.title: Whole Punch
customer_reviews.text: It's a hole punch. It works well, even in cardstock.
customer_reviews.author: Wirenut

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Good looking, easy to use and strong. love it. wnt another one.
customer_reviews.author: Friend

customer_reviews.title: Punches the holes easily and does up to 12 at a time.
customer_reviews.text: I use this to 3-hold punch my printed genealogy records.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Bay

customer_reviews.title: Helps keep my kids homework in order
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy it makes the holes--everything lines up in his binder--great idea and best price
customer_reviews.author: Samorakon

customer_reviews.title: Good Hole Punch
customer_reviews.text: This works great- it can hold a decent amount of papers. My only concern is the materials are not of super high quality, but seems adequate.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Easy to measure and powerful punch
customer_reviews.text: I used this product before. After 4 years, i still stick to the same brand. I like the accurate 3 holes measurement on the side of this item. I never had any issue getting the holes done. Good product deserve a good rating.
customer_reviews.author: Bungheng

customer_reviews.title: Good One
customer_reviews.text: This hole punch is easy to use, easy to line up pages to hole-punch, and fits neatly in desk drawers. And is relatively light weight.
customer_reviews.author: David White

customer_reviews.title: Good product! 12 papers at a time
customer_reviews.text: Works really well for the amount of papers it is advertised for! Definitely not heavy duty, but it does the job for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: nabil

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I've used it a few times since purchase. Works well with a pile of papers. Also used it on some laminated sheets with no problems. Seems sturdy so it won't break.
customer_reviews.author: Shellys423

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my niece who is heading off the college in August.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use and holes don't move themselves.
customer_reviews.text: A light weight, easy to push hole punch that stays in place until you move it! Can't ask for much more than that!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very nice punch
customer_reviews.text: I just received this 2 weeks ago and after punching like 300 sheets I would say this is very nice light duty punch, I have not had many punches before but this one is just doing very nice and clean job so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I especially like that there is an edge where my paper should lay against for the perfect hole punch!
customer_reviews.author: Johnilla

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Its small but perfect because it doesn't take up too much space. I didn't think it was going to work out at first cause it was so small but its the same measurements as a big one. Very sturdy. Im happy. You can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Dianna

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I took this out of the box, the middle hole punch was missing a piece that holds the metal hole punch part in place. I tried for 30 minutes to get it in but it wouldnt line up so I'm unable to use.
customer_reviews.author: tina pittore

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Have only had it about a week but is really holding up and has a very sturdy feel!
customer_reviews.author: Rob O.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This works perfect. Does exactly what I need it to do
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Espinosa

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Works great I like it because you can use it on any size paper
customer_reviews.author: N. Miller

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 recommend
customer_reviews.text: Easy to punch through several papers at once, clean cut, stylish design
customer_reviews.author: Madeline VanVoorst

customer_reviews.title: Needed another
customer_reviews.text: I needed another one of these... my daughter stole my last one and liked it so much I never got it back. It's compact and cuts paper just fine. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great for arthritic wrist, less strain.
customer_reviews.text: Great for office use , especially if you have arthritis.
customer_reviews.author: Karrianne

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. I’m in nursing school and am constantly printing papers and needed a 3 hole punch. It works great. It doesn’t do a ton of papers at a time but it does enough. Perfect for home or school use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Lightning fast delivery. Very sturdy and heavy duty. Sleek design. You wont be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Punching holes for everyone
customer_reviews.text: I feel like a Boxer when I punch holes with such ease. Would recommend to people with heavy duty whole punching needs and those I need to punch the occasional hole.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: For the price it’s a great product. I was surprised at how well it went through several pieces of paper.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica G.

customer_reviews.title: Good hole puncher, convenient for home use. . .
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, I mainly use this to punch holes in my monthly bills to put into a folder. The most I do is like 5-6 sheets or less. For the price not too bad. Bought this replace my cheap plastic hole puncher that recently cracked.
customer_reviews.author: JustK3n

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Like that it gets more compact for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: First one I got didn't cut the one of the holes all the way through. Got a replacement (great CS!) and the new one works great!
customer_reviews.author: Oborodzuki

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool, almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Probably my favorite hole puncher if I had to pick one. 5 stars if the lip to line the paper against was high enough for a stack of 12 sheets; I need to slowly place each stack which decreases my efficiency when I'm putting together a package.
customer_reviews.author: LAV

customer_reviews.title: Happy w/ product
customer_reviews.text: This is a good hole puncher for 8 1/2 x 11 paper only. Seems to be sharp and slices thru several sheet like butter.
customer_reviews.author: CSmith

customer_reviews.title: Qulaity feel
customer_reviews.text: Very nice to use. Feels quality. Would recommend it and would definitely buy it again. Easy to use and doesn't take allot of force to go through the pages. Very happy I got it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lyders

customer_reviews.title: Good hole punch
customer_reviews.text: What can you say other than it punches holes in paper. Just what my wife needed.
customer_reviews.author: timothy

customer_reviews.title: Better than the usual
customer_reviews.text: I browsed a few hole punchers before deciding on this one. Good quality and fair price compared to other hole punchers. It punches 12 sheets instead of the usual 10, which is good when you are punching a lot of papers at once. It also has a ruler.
customer_reviews.author: catch me at the movies

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome piece of equipment. Can only do a stack of about 5 to 6 pages max. It Is a very handy size and storing is so much easier than the swingline brand which is bulky and heavy
customer_reviews.author: Chats

customer_reviews.title: From a hole punch snot....
customer_reviews.text: A self-proclaimed hole punch snot, who, doesn't want to actually spend a lot of $ on office products.... This is an awesome hole puncher! It punches way more then it claims to (12-sheets.... try 20, at least). It's powerful. It doesn't jam, get stuck, or make you worry that it will do either... Additionally it has a feature that locks it closed. Not sure what the use is, but, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: MBG155

customer_reviews.text: 4/5 stars because the last hole punch does not punch a hole. Other than that, works fine. I've punched about 15 papers at max and had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Kim P.

customer_reviews.title: Easy and efficient!
customer_reviews.text: Being used in school. Very happy with it! Easy to use and works efficiently.
customer_reviews.author: Love it and live it

customer_reviews.title: Really smooth punching action
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised at how much I like this. I was concerned about buying a punch that wasn't a Swingline or Acco, but the action is smooth. I'm ridiculously pleased with this hole punch.
customer_reviews.author: Icemom

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This 3 hole punch works great - smooth, easy and nothing gets stuck. Makes filing a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I needed an economical hole punch so I tried this one. It's well built and does what it's supposed to perfectly. If I were to need another hole punch this one would be it!
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Very loud
customer_reviews.text: Although I understand punching holes in paper can't be silent, this hole puncher is much louder than any other I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best hole punch I had
customer_reviews.text: Well made easy to use. Saved a lot on time not having to make sure everything was in line. Best hole pouch I had
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Does the job and has held up so far. I've only been using it for a few weeks. We'll see.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Trout

customer_reviews.title: Very nice unit.
customer_reviews.text: This hole puncher is very light ,needs a little pressure to cut holes clean. Very nice unit.
customer_reviews.author: D.M.

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: So much easier to use than my old one. Great

customer_reviews.title: NOT PAPERPRO BRAND
customer_reviews.text: Not PAPERPRO brand like I thought, but overall good product

customer_reviews.title: Decent hole punch
customer_reviews.text: Good for home use. Seems to work well enough for the pages as rated.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use even when you are making holes in ...
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use even when you are making holes in several sheets at once. I also like the locking feature.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Functional, practical. On the lighter side. Does not have an adjusable guide.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal L.

customer_reviews.title: Mike Tyson of hole punches (get it? Punch?)
customer_reviews.text: Compact and surprisingly easy motion which easily punches through multiple pieces of paper.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive, made of mostly metal parts, and does the job well! Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Seabaugh

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I use this when I download my music and put it in a 3 ring binder nice affordable item.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, sturdy Wife loves it for her work binder papers.
customer_reviews.author: w.b

customer_reviews.title: Great hole puncher
customer_reviews.text: Effortless hole puncher. Finally retired from our old puncher and upgraded to this one and its been wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Kayu

customer_reviews.title: Big improvement
customer_reviews.text: This punch is much easier to use than the one it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Sue in California

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Worked as intended. I am happy with product and price!
customer_reviews.author: D. Moss

customer_reviews.title: I love to try new recipes and have printed lots of ...
customer_reviews.text: I love to try new recipes and have printed lots of them from the internet. Now I'm putting together notebooks and needed a punch. This one works well and does several sheets at a time. I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: much needed office tool thank you so very much: ...
customer_reviews.text: much needed office tool thank you so very much :-) Peace!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. This was a great price and gets the job done. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: idigtexaspugs

product_meta.title: PaperPro inPRESS 12 Reduced Effort Three-Hole Punch, Silver/Black (2101)
product_meta.description:
Size:12 Sheet Black

Paperwork can be a hassle, but hole punching it shouldn't be. The PaperPro inPRESS™ 12’s ProPunch™ technology, experience 50% easier, jam-free punching when you need it most.

For demanding environments, the sleek all metal construction delivers impressive performance while the base’s non-slip grip protects your desktop and provides stability during use. The integrated ruler and paper guide provide consistency during punching, and the handle locks down for compact storage. Built-in waste chamber collects unwanted chips and easily empties through a door. With a smooth, curved ergonomic handle shape, conquer paper stacks with unprecedented ease. Three-Year Limited Warranty.

FEATURES:

 * ProPunch™ technology for 50% easier punching
 * Easily 3 hole punch up to 12 sheets
 * Sleek, all metal hole punch for powerful performance
 * Jam-free for smooth, continuous operation
 * Integrated ruler for quick measuring
 * Built-in paper guide for accurate hole alignment
 * Curved, ergonomic shape fits comfortably in the palm of your hand
 * Handle locks down for storage
 * Non-slip grips on the base offer extra stability + desktop protection during use
feature_bullets: Low force design makes it 40% easier
Advanced cutting dies punch through up to 12 sheets of paper
Easy to use empty waste collection compartment
